page.title: 14Daily routines
page.content: and ends that I need, then I go home. Once home i prepare the evening meal, ready for he family when they return home from school and work. I hoover the lounge and make sure that al the beds are made and the bedroms are tidy. After the evening meal is over and the wshing up done. I usualy have to transport one of the children to either scouts or brownies or piano lessons or any where else they want to go. In the evening we all sit together in the lounge and talk to each other and watch television until Richard and Amanda to to bed. We thn hae our supper before Malcolm nd I get ready for bed at about 10.30.
